Hmmm... It is rare to see someone talking to me. Let me tell you a story~ I was once a captain of a group of sailors. My sailors and myself were sailing along the peninsular, we encountered something that we could never forget in our entire life! We saw a Ghost Ship travelling along the coast way! Vividly, we could see a bunch of fearsome Ghosts roaming freely along the ship~

And of course, upon seeing all these ghosts, we fled in terror. From that day forward, we never went out to sea again. We had related our encounters to most people around. And wouldn't you know it! All of them thought we were lying! No one ever believed our story! Oh well.
Sob~ Sob~ I miss my good old days.... Anyway, do you believe me? Can you believe me?
